replies.body:
Veigar actually needs buff instead of nerfs
problems with Veigar :
-Heavily skill shot based (excluding ult)
-Need to land E to do combo
-No Mobility, No escapes
-W is easily the worst skillshot in game and is impossible to land without E stun
-One of the champions that did not get buffed after the removal of DFG
-His E have a delay 
-Q is no longer point and click and can miss 
-Extremely weak against enemies with mobility
-Squishy
-Cooldowns on E (stun) is high (14 sec at max level)
-No point and click CC like Annie 
-Needs to land E almost perfectly to stun
more like please balance teams in aram
Champion is broken in solo Q, Bump, needs nerf.
